Source.Name: goverlay
Source.Summary: GUI for configuring Vulkan/OpenGL overlays - MangoHud, vkBasalt and ReplaySorcery
Source.Description: GOverlay is an open source project aimed to create a Graphical UI to manage Vulkan/OpenGL overlays. It currently supports MangoHud and GOverlay. It also serves as an alternative to Nvidia Shadowplay, alowing you to record gameplay as well as save replays instantly with ReplaySorcery.
